Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Gashouse in 1986...
Injured on 8/30/1986 with a Broken Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/7/1987, off Robert Rayes (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/1987, off Richard Rhames (PON)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1989, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Troy on 4/10/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1991, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/9/1993 to a 5-year deal worth $5,720,000 per year...
